name: wake-up-slap
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
This attack inflicts
high damage on a
sleeping foe. It
also wakes the foe
up, however.
